sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) has been hit with a new ethics complaint by a political action committee seeking to unseat him that hits the embattled lawmaker with a host of accusations.
author: Emily Brooks
title: Cawthorn hit with new ethics complaint filed by rival PAC

sentence: Madison Cawthorn (@CawthornforNC) April 28, 2022 Cawthorn later tweeted a screenshot of an article from The Epoch Times titled "Rep. Cawthorn Says 'Establishment' Targeting Him With 'Coordinated Drip Campaign.'"
author: Jason Lemon
title: Madison Cawthorn Losing GOP Support Despite Keeping Large Primary Lead

sentence: The Fire Madison Cawthorn group, which is operated by the American Muckrakers PAC, also submitted screenshots of what is believed to be Venmo payments between Smith and the congressman with notes such as "Getting naked for me in Sweden," "The stuff we did in Amsterdam," and "The quickie at the airport" and "breaking and entering."
author: Ewan Palmer
title: Who is Stephen Smith? Madison Cawthorn Staffer Appears to Grope Him in Clip

sentence: Representative Madison Cawthorn appears to be under attack from the right as a series of damaging news stories have been published about the young Republican and a senior member of his own party has taken aim at him.
author: Darragh Roche
title: Madison Cawthorn Is Under Attack from the Right
